about_us.title: Our firm

Also Gleich means “immediately” which presents our quality of service with professional & accuracy and the ability of powerful execution with a short turnaround.

member_1.name: Michael Ivkovi
member_1.title: Independent Chairman of Investment Committee
member_1.desc:
Michael Ivkovic has extensive experience in the structured finance, funds management and investment banking industry in Australia and Asia. Michael was formerly the Chairman of Brick Securities Limited, and Executive Chairman of NZI Securities Limited.

Michael established The Australian Private Capital Advisory Services Group in 1988 and retired from that position in 1998 following a management buyout. Since that time Michael has served as a Director of Paramount Securities Limited and the publicly listed Harrington Limited, AFT Limited, Meridien Resources Limited, Meridien Capital Limited and Capital Mining Limited.
Michael holds a Bachelor of Commerce degree from the University of New South Wales.

business.desc_1: Gleich Income fund is aimed to provide the investor an opportunity to the Australian credit market. The Fund will focus on the medium/low-risk investment (via commercial and residential property mortgages) to preserve investor’s capital and ongoing interest payment.
business.desc_2: Gleich is major focus on commercial lending to provide the borrowers a quick, effective financing solution.

item_1.name: Introduction
item_1.desc: Gleich Income Fund is to invest in residential, industry and commercial real estate mortgages. The income will be from the interest paid by the borrowers. Potential borrowers are real estate developers and commercial property investors. Gleich will be targeting the first mortgage to ensure better the security. The Gleich process and turnaround time will ensure that investors returns should exceed bank term deposits.

item_2.name: Qualified Investors
item_2.desc:
Under Australian laws and regulation, Gleich Income Funds are only for wholesale and sophisticated investor.
Wholesale investor - Single investment over 500K AUD
Sophisticated investor - According to ASIC regulation, the investors annual income is up to 250,000 AUD in any of last two years or personal net assets are over 2.5 million AUD. If certified by an accountant you will be considered as a sophisticated investor.

item_3.name: Product Features
item_3.desc:
1.Secured Investment - the loan has been registered as 1st mortgage and LVR no more than 70% with 3rd party valuation to ensure the security of investment
2.Gleich Process - the whole investment process has been carefully designed, from the referral channel to risk assessment，loan approval process, legal preparation and ongoing management.
3.Better Returns - the return of the investment will normally be targeted as the RBA cash rate + 5%.
4. Diversified Risk - the investment will be allocated to different projects, which could diversify the investment risks.

business.desc_1: A commercial business loan is secured funding provided to a business for any commercial or investment purpose. It may be for a commercial premises or it may be just cash-flow for the business operations. There are many advantages this type of arrangement can provide and businesses or start ups can utilise this funding option. This product allows you to borrow up to 70% of the security value.
business.desc_2: If you are looking for a way to leverage off your current commercial property to invest quickly then you may consider this product. By using your current property (with an existing mortgage) as security for another loan, you can acquire more funds to purchase that 2nd commercial property or expand your business.
business.desc_3: Convertible loan is a short-term debt that may converts into equity. Usually it converts at the next investment round. We will assist people for new business idea by providing convertible loans.
